creditline: Bequest of Professor Albert Mathias Friend, Jr., Class of 1915

texts.textentryhtml: Said to have been found near Hama, Syria; acquired by Albert Mathias Friend, Jr., from John Khayat, May 22, 1937; by bequest to the Museum in 1956
